page.title: 06PASS OFF PARADE
page.content: The Brigadier was wearing a dark blue suit with two red stripes down each leg and a red stripe round his hat.The Brigadier inspected the troops and talked to some of the soldiers. Unfortunately,one poor lad fainted and had to be taken off the square.The Brigadier moved to the dais.The band began to play again as the troops marched past,first in slow time,then in quick time. As the troops passed the marker they turned their heads to the Brigadier while he took the salute.To {Auld Lang Syne}the Pass Off Troops marched off in one direction and the parade troops in another direction.The Parade lasted 1 hour and 10 minutes.The Pass Off troops will go elsewhere for Trade Training.
